title: Saar Biotech-Clobetasol Propionate, Neomycin Sulphate, Miconazole Nitrate and Chlorocresol|Pharmaceutical Company in Baddi
meta: Manufacturer & Suppliers of third party manufacturing also manufacture Clobetasol Propionate, Neomycin Sulphate, Miconazole Nitrate and Chlorocresol is a combination of Clobetasol Propionate, Miconazole Nitrate and Neomycin sulphate. Clobetasol propionate is a type of medicine called a topical corticosteroid. Clobetasol Propionate is a highly active corticosteroid. Miconazole is an imidazole antifungal agent. Neomycin is an aminoglycoside antibiotic. The combination of Clobetasol, neomycin and Miconazole is used to treat severe inflammatory skin disorders.
